name: Family of Wisps
description:
The portal to the next world awaits,  but it can only be opened by a group acting in unison.  

Build a family of wisps large enough that the portal opens.    

if wisps fall behind they will leave your group.   Getting eaten is also kinda bad, don't get eaten.

(There are three levels but the code to start the next level didn't make the deadline,  Le sigh..)
